article_title: Oxford scientists develop new coronavirus test that provides results in just 30 minutes
article_description: Scientists at the University of Oxford have developed a new coronavirus test that produces results around three times faster than the current fastest testing methods  and that requires only relatively simple technical instrumentation  In addition to these ben
